sentences: Nortt is an extreme metal musical project formed in 1995 by a Danish musician who goes by an eponymous pseudonym and describes his music as "Pure Depressive Black Funeral Doom Metal".
Nortt / Xasthur (with Xasthur) (2004) (containing tracks from Hedengangen EP)
Interview (2005) with Erin Fox on The Gauntlet (in English)
Interview (2004) with Paolo Vidmar on Metal Italia (in Italian)
